short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows prices in USD on bittrex.com. Uses the BTC/USD price given on bittrex.com for conversions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hover over a price that is shown in BTC or ETH on bittrex.com and the extension will automatically convert it to USD for you. 

Uses the BTC/USD price given on bittrex.com for conversions.

Report issues at support@kikbits.com.
